name: Keno
description:
Now you can play the traditional keno game on your Mac. Click between 2 and 10 numbers, press Go, then anxiously watch as 20 random numbers, or balls, are chosen to see how many matches you get. The more you bet, the more you win (or lose…)!

Features:
• Retro Casino Feel
• Win Meter
• Quick Pick (Random Numbers)
• Saves Credits between sessions
• Multiple Speeds
• Bet up to 1,000,000 credits per game
• … OH, AND IT'S FREE!

Keno provides hours of fun. If you like other casino games like poker, texas hold 'em, slot machines, roulette, or black jack, then you'll want to add this exciting classic Keno game to your collection!

We give you 100 Credits to start (and every time you run out). Can you get up to 1,000? Ten thousand? One Million? We challenge you to do so.

In addition to free credits, you can also choose to purchase credits.
